global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Eeastern Boundary (EB) line 2020-03-02T11:09:59 UTC and recovered 2020-05-22 18:44:27 UTC. The DVL was disabled on 2020-04-17 to conserve battery power. The altimeter began to fail in late April so the glider was restricted to deeper water and the southern portion of the EB line on 2020-05-03. The glider was caught in eddies and blown off course multiple times throughout the deployment. This was a relatively normal deployment.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 200m Slocum Glider cp_339
